items.title: Amazon.com (NasdaqGS:AMZN) Expands AWS Presence With US$5 Billion Data Center Investment In Taiwan
items.description: Amazon.com (NasdaqGS:AMZN) recently announced the launch of its AWS Asia Pacific (Taipei) Region, highlighting a $5 billion investment in data center infrastructure. This expansion, coupled with a $10 billion investment in North Carolina to bolster AI and cloud computing capabilities, underscores Amazon's commitment to innovation and business growth. These significant developments align with Amazon's overall strategic objectives and may enhance its market position. The company's share price...

items.title: If I Could Only Buy and Hold a Single Stock, This Would Be It.
items.description: What if you could only own one stock forever? My pick for a single-stock portfolio might surprise you.

items.title: Amazon, Hot IPO Lead Five Stocks Near Buy Points
items.description: Amazon is near a buy point, already triggering an early entry. IPO eToro and a trio from software, uranium mining and heavy construction are on the list.

items.title: QQA: New Option Strategy ETF In The Nasdaq 100
items.description: QQA offers an 8.63% yield from option strategies in the Nasdaq 100 and its track record shows a total return nearly matching QQQ. Read more on QQA's potential vs. its peers.

items.title: 2 No-Brainer Stocks I'd Buy Right Now Without Hesitation
items.description: Constellation Software is a growth machine that has a huge opportunity in the vertical software industry.  Buying stocks of companies benefiting from long-term industry trends can help you identify rewarding investment opportunities.  The following companies are serving growing demand in the semiconductor and software industries.
